text: Lonesome Luke Lolls in Luxury is a 1916 short comedy film featuring Harold Lloyd. It was a silent film. ==Cast== * Harold Lloyd - Lonesome Luke * Gene Marsh * Snub Pollard * Bebe Daniels ==See also== * Harold Lloyd filmography ==References== ==External links== * Category:1916 films Category:1916 comedy films Category:American films Category:American comedy films Category:American black-and-white films Category:1916 short films Category:American silent short films Category:Films directed by Hal Roach Category:Lonesome Luke films Category:Comedy short films
title: Lonesome Luke Lolls in Luxury
